title: Monogram for class
content:
hey all,   
   
i've designed three quick logos based on my initials. i'd appreciate it if i could get some feedback on how i could improve either all of them or any specific one. thanks!   
   
   
\<img\>
author: clearbolt

comments.content: [http://www.clearbolt.com/mgram\_ry.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419162320/http:/www.clearbolt.com/mgram_ry.jpg) is where the image is. i'm having trouble getting the image tag to work. weird.

I like the rotationally symmetrical one best, but of course I'm into that. From what I can see, it's not _exactly_ symmetrical; the bit in the middle of the Y is thinner and more horizontal than the corresponding part of the R. I would make it match by duplicating the R.   
   
(I don't think this forum accepts remote image tags; inline images are made by uploading.)
You should definately go for number two!

Russ, for the number two you can take a look if you haven't at this awesome thread:   
   
 [http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/17882.html?1066151621](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419162320/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/17882.html?1066151621)
